strapiPost.title: Conversate And Caffeinate During The Fayetteville Coffee Crawl
strapiPost.content:
Take a tour of Fayetteville's coffee scene during the Fayetteville Coffee Crawl, beginning this Friday, Jan 27, and lasting until Feb 3.

  • Gotta try 'em all: Stamp cards will be available at Puritan and Summer Moon. Visit at least seven of the ten participating shops to be eligible for prizes.
  • Sip and share: The Fayetteville Coffee Crawl was dreamt up by local Emma Nelson, who wanted to share her enjoyment of great conversations and genuine community that can form across the coffee table.

Find all the information you need right HERE.
